name: @ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-classic

scripts.preversion: npm run build; if [ -n "$(git status src/ckeditor.js build/ --porcelain)" ]; then git add -u src/ckeditor.js build/ && git commit -m 'Internal: Build.'; fi
